label: GROWTH & ONBOARDING
title: Self-Serve Trial for an Enterprise AI Platform
description: I led the launch of DataRobot's self-serve trial motion. In a six-month window, I redesigned the multi-tenant onboarding to support organic expansion, added social login to reduce friction, and introduced a streamlined trial experience that generated a 3X conversion rate improvement. The result was a scalable product-led growth motion that significantly boosted user acquisition and conversion through social signups, organic user invitations, and a tailored onboarding experience.

meta.proudOf: Turning a complex enterprise AI platform into a first-session success for new users
meta.learned: How to balance enterprise constraints with product-led growth

sections.label: DISTILLING DOWN
sections.heading: Problem and Hypothesis
sections.content: DataRobot's previous trial prevented users from growing their team within the product. I believed that a trial which supported organic expansion within an existing tenant would help grow total user base and conversion rates.

sections.label: BIAS TOWARDS ACTION
sections.heading: Build and Learn
sections.content: I led the end-to-end trial launch, working beyond my team’s core product scope to align marketing, data, growth, and platform readiness. I delivered the trial signup flow, tenant provisioning, and UX improvements, including admin setup and inviting up to five users on the free tier. I instrumented the funnel to measure activation, engagement, and expansion, and partnered with users and data scientists to define trial limits and features. Finally, I collaborated with marketing on A/B-tested drip campaigns to drive trial conversion.

sections.label: THE
sections.heading: Results
sections.content:
The new trial program had a major impact on user growth and revenue pipeline. It is still featured today as one of the first CTAs on DataRobot's website.

- **2,500+ MAU:** Within a few months, trial usage exploded to over 2,500 monthly active users, dramatically expanding the top of our funnel.
- **3× conversion uplift:** Trial-to-paid conversion rates jumped ~3× compared to the old approach. By removing friction, facilitating invites, and guiding users to value, far more trial users became paying customers. Importantly, trial workspaces with 3+ users showed much higher conversion, validating our focus on team onboarding.

The self-serve trial became a key lead source for sales. Trial engagement data helped identify high-intent accounts and armed sales with insights, turning the trial into a reliable lead-gen pipeline.

sections.label: LESSONS
sections.heading: Learned
sections.content:
- **Lesson 1:** Set a fast pace and others will follow
- **Lesson 2:** Repeat key information over and over
- **Lesson 3:** Run more experiments
